name: Quack's Cave
description:
Quack's Cavern

Made for the Lost Cartridge Jame 22 by Dosmaen

Controls:

B / x on Keyboard = Jump

D-Pad : Move character

I didn't have enough time to put together music or many levels, but there is something playable here.

It's a short little platformer slighlty inspired by Super Meat Boy.

Nothing too crazy. I made all of the graphics execept for the font and message window which were built into the GBStudio program.
